# <a name="read-receipts"></a><span data-ttu-id="0c4d8-102">Potvrde da je poruka pročitana</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0c4d8-102">Read receipts</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0c4d8-103">Da biste zahtevali potvrdu da je poruka pročitana ili potvrdu o isporuci za vašu poruku u programu Outlook na Webu:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0c4d8-103">To request a read receipt or a delivery receipt for your message in Outlook on the web:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="0c4d8-104">Izaberite tri tačke</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0c4d8-104">Select the three dots</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="0c4d8-105">na vrhu okna za pisanje poruke.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0c4d8-105">at the top of the message compose pane.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="0c4d8-106">Izaberite opciju " **Prikaži opcije poruke**".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0c4d8-106">Select **Show message options**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="0c4d8-107">Izaberite stavku **Zahtevaj potvrdu da je pročitano** ili **zatražite potvrdu o isporuci**ili oboje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0c4d8-107">Select **Request a read receipt** or **Request a delivery receipt**, or both.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0c4d8-108">Da biste odabrali način na koji Outlook odgovara za čitanje zahteva za potvrdu, idite na</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0c4d8-108">To choose how Outlook responds to read receipt requests, go to</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="0c4d8-109">**Postavke** > za > **Message handling\*\*\*\*Prikaz svih postavki programa Outlook**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0c4d8-109">**Settings** > **View all Outlook settings** > **Message handling**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0c4d8-110">Za više informacija pogledajte odeljak [čitanje potvrde u programu Outlook na vebu](https://support.office.com/article/e09af74d-3519-45fc-a680-37a538a92157).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0c4d8-110">For more information, see [Read receipts in Outlook on the web](https://support.office.com/article/e09af74d-3519-45fc-a680-37a538a92157).</span></span>
